name: Monster Hunter Land
description:
Controls
A + D = move
Space = jump
Mouse + Left button = shoot

Play as the lad from hell destroying the dinosaur and weird flying bat monsters! You die in 1 hit, so be careful! Can you beat the all the 50 generated levels, or will you fall victim to one of the unique 7?!

The game is currently in an unfinished state and will likely receive some backgrounds and music in the coming day(s).
